sentences.en: A high proportion of crime is perpetrated by young males in their teens and twenties.
sentences.cn: 很大一部分案件乃是十几岁的少年和二十多岁的青年男子所为。

sentences.en: A minority of children are sexually active before they are in their teens.
sentences.cn: 少数孩子十几岁前已有性行为.

sentences.en: His son is in his teens.
Most people who smoke began smoking in their teens.
sentences.cn: 多数烟民从十几岁时就开始抽烟了。

sentences.en: My late teens and early twenties were really rough years.
sentences.cn: 我二十岁前后那几年过得真苦啊。

sentences.en: She began writing poetry in her teens .
She is not yet out of her teens , ie is under 20.
She started writing plays in her early teens under the influence of Eugene O'Neill.
sentences.cn: 在欧仁-奥尼尔的影响下,她在十几岁便开始写剧本.

sentences.en: She was in her early teens.
She's not yet out of her teens.
Since her parents died early, she had to paddle her own canoe even in her teens.
sentences.cn: 因父母早亡, 她十几几岁的时候就不得不自谋杀生计.

sentences.en: The signs are that indulged children tend to become unmanageable when they reach their teens.
sentences.cn: 这些迹象表明被宠坏的孩子在十几岁的时候往往会变得难以管教。

sentences.en: Though still in his teens, Tom is shrewd at a bargain.
sentences.cn: 虽然汤姆才十多岁,可是讨价还价却很在行.

sentences.en: You reach puberty in your teens.
sentences.cn: 人十多岁就到达青春期.

words.tran_cn: 十几岁的青少年；十三岁到十九岁的少年

phrases.tran_cn: 少年晚期；20岁左右的青年男女

trans.tran_cn: 十几岁，十三至十九数字（或号码），青少年们，十几岁( teen的名词复数 )，<古>悲哀，痛苦，(13-19岁的)青少年
trans.tran_en: If you are a teen in your teens, you are between thirteen and nineteen years old. Teen is informal for teenager.
